title: ID on this font??
content:
Hi,

I’m hoping someone can identify this font for me. \*NOT\* that I like it, but a customer really wants to use it on a new sign and I can’t seem to find this anywhere. Please help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [HPIM1820.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20090528080817/http:/typophile.com/files/HPIM1820.JPG) | 52.65 KB |
author: ejwoodward

comments.content:
I think it’s a font called Siena Black.

- Mike Yanega

[Here is a link](http://web.archive.org/web/20090528080817/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atsiena-black/). The font has been compressed in your sample.

- Mike Yanega
